TaggedValue.value: v2.2-Frozen before metadata changes, incremented to v2.21 v2.3 frozen before changes made and incremented to v2.4 V2.4 frozen following feedback from project board and assurance committee. V2.5 frozen after adding the assessments section. V3.0 frozen after making amendments to implementation guidance of NEWS 2 score and blood pressure. V3.0.1 frozen after updating blank operationalisation fields. V3.01 Frozen after updating implementation guidance for 'Reason for service', and reformatting version structure. V3.01.03 Updated clinical narrative implementation guidance to specify that this field also covers 'Professional discussions undertaken'. Update consultation outcome implementation guidance to include more valueset options for different CPCF services.
